ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا۟ تَعْقِلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He has led huge numbers of you into error. Why did you not use your intellect?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But he beguiled a great many of you. Why did you not then understand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Still, he misguided a whole throng of you. Did you have no sense?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Satan misled a great multitude of you. Did you not have any understanding?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And he has indeed led a large number of you astray; so did you not have sense?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed he did lead astray a great multitude of you. Did you not then understand"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly he led astray numerous people from among you. What! could you not then understand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He led astray many a throng of you; did you not understand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Yet he hath led astray of you a great multitude. Had ye then no sense?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Yet he led astray a great multitude of you. Why did you not then understand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And yet assuredly he hath led astray of you a great multitude. Wherefore reflect ye not?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly, he has led astray many of your generations. Have you not exercised your reason?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But he did lead astray a great multitude of you. Did ye not, then, understand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed he (Satan) did lead astray a great multitude of you. Did you not, then, understand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Yet he has led many a host of you astray, did you not understand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He has misled a great multitude of you. Did you not understand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And he had already led astray from among you much of creation, so did you not use reason?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:62] For verily he has led astray from among you many a creature (jibillan is the plural of jabīl, similar [in pattern] to qadīm, ‘old’; a variant reading has jubulan). Did you not use to comprehend?, his enmity and his misguidance, or the chastisements that befell them and so believe? And it will be said to them in the Hereafter:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Yet he) the devil (hath led astray of you) children of Adam (a great multitude) of people before you. (Had ye then no sense) did you not know what he did to them, and hence avoid following their path?
